episodes.name: Brothers, Sons and Lovers
episodes.overview: Family members find beloved funeral director Byron Griffy brutally murdered. As investigators delve into Byron's life, they uncover startling revelations about his grandson, handyman, and two local celebrity brothers, each emerging as a possible suspect.

episodes.name: Closets Hide Skeletons
episodes.overview: Police uncover disturbing truths about the town’s prominent brothers, including their possession of a missing coin collection. One brother’s affair with a local prison guard leads to a shocking confession of a secret relationship — and a sudden death.

episodes.name: Burying the Guilty
episodes.overview: The trial for Byron Griffey’s murder begins, and an investigator uncovers numerous new leads and suppressed evidence that casts doubt on the eventual conviction. A surprise sentence outrages many and leaves questions unanswered.
